name: Davin Work Gloves Imperial
name_cn: 达文工作手套 帝王紫
description: Field-tested for over fifty years, you can find Davin work gloves at numerous sites and ships around the Empire. Stegman's rugged construction and comfort lining have made them a customer favorite.
description_cn: 超过五十多年的现场测试,您可以在全帝国的许多站点和飞船上找到戴文工作手套.施特格曼坚固的结构和舒适的内衬使其成为客户的最爱.
